name: Complete Guide to Modern Web Development
description: Master the fundamentals of web development with this comprehensive guide covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Building Scalable Applications
description: Learn best practices for creating maintainable and scalable web applications using modern frameworks.

name: Advanced State Management Patterns
description: Deep dive into state management solutions and patterns for complex applications.

name: Performance Optimization Techniques
description: Discover practical techniques to improve your application's performance and user experience.

description: Learn how to design and implement robust and scalable APIs for your applications.
